Producer: Marc Lhormer, Brenda Lhormer, Peter Phok, Christopher H. Warner
Synopsis: A year after her family suffers an unimaginable loss, teenage Tess pens a heartfelt letter to her dead little sister Zoe, reflecting on what was lost, her resistance to traveling with her family down recovery road, and the surprising sources from which she gains love and support so that she can begin to get better.
Title: Dear Zoe
